titleStmt.title: Londons declaration, in the defence of the citisens now in arms concerning certain aspersions cast upon them, some calling them traitors and rebels to the king : of which, they here nobley cleere themselves, proving of themselves to the whole kingdom, in stead of traytors and rebels, carefull, true and loyall subjects both to king and kingdome.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
